name: suprubii
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c0, cle, csup(c1, cr, clt)))
-| w3a(wss(c1, cr), wne(c1, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))))

stmt.origin: mpan(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c0, cle, csup(c1, cr, clt)), w3a(wss(c1, cr), wne(c1, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0))))))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c0, cle, csup(c1, cr, clt)))
-| w3a(wss(c1, cr), wne(c1, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))))
-| wi(wa(w3a(wss(c1, cr), wne(c1, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0))))), wcel(c0, c1)), wbr(c0, cle, csup(c1, cr, clt)))

|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c0, cle, csup(c1, cr, clt)))

-| wi(wa(w3a(wss(c1, cr), wne(c1, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0))))), wcel(c0, c1)), wbr(c0, cle, csup(c1, cr, clt)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w3a(wss(c1, cr), wne(c1, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c1, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0))))), wcel(c0, c1)), wbr(c0, cle, csup(c1, cr, clt)))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsc(s1, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c0, cle, csup(c1, cr, clt)))

comment: A member of a nonempty bounded set of reals is less than or equal to the set's upper bound. (Contributed by NM, 12-Sep-1999.)
